textBeforeTable: their report of layoffs at Obsidian, though these are still unconfirmed. Thanks nin. Metacritic. They also note no longer existent account, allegedly saying: "[Fallout: New Vegas] was a straight payment, no royalties, only a bonus if we got an 85+ on Metacritic, which we didn't." Sure enough, the game currently sits at 84 on Joystiq, saying this came in a tweet from a Fallout: New Vegas, reports Obsidian's Chris Avellone indicated that Obsidian just missed a bonus for [Mar 15, 2012, 8:50 pm ET] - Share - Viewing Comments Fallout: New Vegas Bonus Missed by 1 Point; Obsidian Layoffs --> Blue's News Favorite!
